languages.text: "Он — наш брат. Ему не должно странствовать с обычными смертными или одному. Волки — как острые ножи, мы точимся друг о друга, а без братьев он проржавеет и станет слабым. Будь с нами, Ульфар, мы тебя примем".

"He is our brother. He should not be left to wander the galaxy in the company of ordinary mortals, or alone. Wolves are like sharp knives, we hone ourselves against each other, and without brothers, Ulfar will rust and grow dull. Be with us, Ulfar, we will take you in."
languages.original_text: "Он — наш брат. Ему не должно странствовать с обычными смертными или одному. Волки — как острые ножи, мы точимся друг о друга, а без братьев он проржавеет и станет слабым. Будь с нами, Ульфар, мы тебя примем".

traits.locale_text: "He is our brother. He should not be left to wander the galaxy in the company of ordinary mortals, or alone. Wolves are like sharp knives, we hone ourselves against each other, and without brothers, Ulfar will rust and grow dull. Be with us, Ulfar, we will take you in."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "He is our brother. He should not be left to wander the galaxy in the company of ordinary mortals, or alone. Wolves are like sharp knives, we hone ourselves against each other, and without brothers, Ulfar will rust and grow dull. Be with us, Ulfar, we will take you in."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “他是我们的兄弟，不能与普通的凡人为伍，也不能在银河系中独自游荡。狼群就像锋利的刀刃一样，我们依靠彼此互相磨砺。若是失去了兄弟，乌尔法独自一人会生锈、变钝。加入我们吧，乌尔法，我们愿意接受你。”
languages.original_text: "He is our brother. He should not be left to wander the galaxy in the company of ordinary mortals, or alone. Wolves are like sharp knives, we hone ourselves against each other, and without brothers, Ulfar will rust and grow dull. Be with us, Ulfar, we will take you in."

traits.locale_text: “他是我们的兄弟，不能与普通的凡人为伍，也不能在银河系中独自游荡。狼群就像锋利的刀刃一样，我们依靠彼此互相磨砺。若是失去了兄弟，乌尔法独自一人会生锈、变钝。加入我们吧，乌尔法，我们愿意接受你。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「俺の同胞だからだよ。普通の人間と一緒に、あるいはひとりでこの銀河をぶらぶらするような器じゃないんだ。狼は切れ味のいいナイフのようなもんだ。切磋琢磨して鋭くなってく。同胞なしじゃ、ウルファーはさびついて鈍っちまう。俺らと来い、ウルファー、歓迎するぜ」
languages.original_text: "He is our brother. He should not be left to wander the galaxy in the company of ordinary mortals, or alone. Wolves are like sharp knives, we hone ourselves against each other, and without brothers, Ulfar will rust and grow dull. Be with us, Ulfar, we will take you in."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の同胞だからだよ。普通の人間と一緒に、あるいはひとりでこの銀河をぶらぶらするような器じゃないんだ。狼は切れ味のいいナイフのようなもんだ。切磋琢磨して鋭くなってく。同胞なしじゃ、ウルファーはさびついて鈍っちまう。俺らと来い、ウルファー、歓迎するぜ」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Es nuestro hermano. No podemos condenarlo a vagar por la galaxia con unos simples mortales... o por su cuenta. Los Lobos son como cuchillos afilados; nos pulimos enfrentándonos entre nosotros. Y, sin sus hermanos, Ulfar se oxidará y no cumplirá su deber. Quédate con nosotros, Ulfar. Te acogeremos».
languages.original_text: "He is our brother. He should not be left to wander the galaxy in the company of ordinary mortals, or alone. Wolves are like sharp knives, we hone ourselves against each other, and without brothers, Ulfar will rust and grow dull. Be with us, Ulfar, we will take you in."

traits.locale_text: «Es nuestro hermano. No podemos condenarlo a vagar por la galaxia con unos simples mortales... o por su cuenta. Los Lobos son como cuchillos afilados; nos pulimos enfrentándonos entre nosotros. Y, sin sus hermanos, Ulfar se oxidará y no cumplirá su deber. Quédate con nosotros, Ulfar. Te acogeremos».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « C'est notre frère. Nous ne pouvons pas le laisser arpenter la galaxie seul ou en compagnie de mortels ordinaires. Les Loups sont comme des couteaux acérés qui s'affûtent mutuellement. Privés de ses frères, Ulfar va rouiller et s'émousser. Joins-toi à nous, Ulfar. Nous t'accueillerons à bras ouverts. »
languages.original_text: "He is our brother. He should not be left to wander the galaxy in the company of ordinary mortals, or alone. Wolves are like sharp knives, we hone ourselves against each other, and without brothers, Ulfar will rust and grow dull. Be with us, Ulfar, we will take you in."

traits.locale_text: « C'est notre frère. Nous ne pouvons pas le laisser arpenter la galaxie seul ou en compagnie de mortels ordinaires. Les Loups sont comme des couteaux acérés qui s'affûtent mutuellement. Privés de ses frères, Ulfar va rouiller et s'émousser. Joins-toi à nous, Ulfar. Nous t'accueillerons à bras ouverts. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Er ist unser Bruder. Er sollte nicht in Gesellschaft gewöhnlicher Sterblicher oder alleine die Galaxie durchwandern. Wölfe sind wie scharfe Messer, die sich aneinander wetzen, und ohne Brüder wird Ulfar einrosten und stumpf werden. Bleibt bei uns, Ulfar, wir nehmen Euch auf."
languages.original_text: "He is our brother. He should not be left to wander the galaxy in the company of ordinary mortals, or alone. Wolves are like sharp knives, we hone ourselves against each other, and without brothers, Ulfar will rust and grow dull. Be with us, Ulfar, we will take you in."

traits.locale_text: "Er ist unser Bruder. Er sollte nicht in Gesellschaft gewöhnlicher Sterblicher oder alleine die Galaxie durchwandern. Wölfe sind wie scharfe Messer, die sich aneinander wetzen, und ohne Brüder wird Ulfar einrosten und stumpf werden. Bleibt bei uns, Ulfar, wir nehmen Euch auf."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "O bizim kardeşimiz. Sıradan fânilerle veya tek başına galaksiyi gezmesine göz yumamayız. Kurtlar; keskin bir bıçak gibidir, birbirimize sürtünerek keskinleşiriz. Ulfar, kardeşleri olmadan paslanıp körelir. Bizimle gel Ulfar, seni aramıza alacağız."
languages.original_text: "He is our brother. He should not be left to wander the galaxy in the company of ordinary mortals, or alone. Wolves are like sharp knives, we hone ourselves against each other, and without brothers, Ulfar will rust and grow dull. Be with us, Ulfar, we will take you in."

traits.locale_text: "O, bizim kardeşimiz. Sıradan fânilerle veya tek başına galaksiyi gezmesine göz yumamayız. Kurtlar keskin bir bıçak gibidir, birbirimize sürtünerek keskinleşiriz. Kardeşleri olmadan Ulfar paslanır ve körelir. Bizimle gel Ulfar, seni aramıza alacağız."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
